results.name: Fursan al-Aqsa: The Knights of the Al-Aqsa Mosque

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 32-bit
  • Processor: 2.0+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Shader Model 4 compatible Video Card with 512MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 19 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: The download size of the game is just 9.8 GB. After the installation it grows to 18.71GB, because this game has modding support and all game's assets are decrypted.
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 7 / 8 / 10 64-bit
  • Processor: 2.0+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Shader Model 4 compatible Video Card with 1GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 19 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: The download size of the game is just 9.8 GB. After the installation it grows to 18.71GB, because this game has modding support and all game's assets are decrypted.

results.name: THE TALE OF UNDERCRUST ~The Last 7 Days of Hasumi~

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display. Lag may occur from loading menus or maps. Turn off other programs before running the game.
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: 2+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display. Lag may occur from loading menus or maps. Turn off other programs before running the game.

requirements_en.minimum:

  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: VRAM320MB, 1280×720
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
